title: VMware Solutions docs
introduction: VMware Solutions is an IBM Cloud offering that provides deployment and management of VMware virtualized environments. Learn how to make the most of your VMware Solutions experience by using the docs, API doc reference, solution architectures, and solution guides.

section_recommended.title: Getting started with VMware Solutions
section_recommended.description: Get familiar with the process of ordering an instance and some services for it.

section_recommended.title: Signing up for required accounts
section_recommended.description: Sign up for an IBM Cloud account and an IBM Cloud infrastructure account.

section_recommended.title: Accessing the VMware Solutions console
section_recommended.description: Review the entry points into the IBM Cloud for VMware Solutions console.

section_recommended.title: Setting up your environment for your first order
section_recommended.description: Ensure that your environment is ready for your order.

section_recommended.title: Ordering services for vCenter Server instances
section_recommended.description: Order services for your VMware vCenter Server instances, such as a disaster recovery solution.

section_recommended.title: Solution architectures on Classic
section_recommended.description: Review reference architecture documentation for VMware Solutions based on the IBM Cloud classic infrastructure.

section_recommended.title: Solution architectures on VPC
section_recommended.description: Review reference architecture documentation for VMware Solutions based on the IBM Cloud VPC infrastructure.

section_recommended.title: Solution guides
section_recommended.description: Learn how to configure various components to leverage additional solutions, such as cyber recovery.

tiles.title: Cyber Recovery instance
tiles.description: The V5.0 release offers a new Cyber Recovery instance. The instance provides a way to protect your systems and data from cyberthreats and attacks. It can assist you with handling ransomware and help you with other problems and threats. The Cyber Recovery instance includes Veeam 11, a Linux hardened repository (LHR), and an edge gateway.

tiles.title: IBM Cloud for VMware Cloud Foundation
tiles.description: The IBM Cloud VPC provides the underlying infrastructure for running VMware Cloud Foundation in IBM Cloud. The IBM Cloud bare metal servers for IBM Cloud VPC provide you compute capacity that is provisioned in minutes for your VMware Cloud Foundation deployment.

tiles.title: IBM Cloud Identity and Access Management enablement for VMware Solutions Shared
tiles.description: You can optionally enable IAM for existing sites. After you integrate your site with IAM, you can use single-sign on to log in to the VMware Cloud Director console from the VMware Solutions console.
